subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Antonio Margarito, his trainer and a training partner apologized for a video mocking Freddie Roach, the trainer of Margarito’s coming opponent, Manny Pacquiao.
snippet: Antonio Margarito, his trainer and a training partner apologized for a video mocking Freddie Roach, the trainer of Margarito’s coming opponent, Manny Pacquiao.
